section.title: Managing Groups
section.para: You can use the ovirt-aaa-jdbc-tool tool to manage group accounts on your internal domain. Managing group accounts is similar to managing user accounts. For a full list of group options, run ovirt-aaa-jdbc-tool group --help. Common examples are provided in this section.

procedure.title: Creating a Group
procedure.para: This procedure shows you how to create a group account, add users to the group, and view the details of the group.

step.para: Log in to the machine on which the Red Hat Virtualization Manager is installed.
Add users to the group. The users must be created already.

note.para: For a full list of the group-manage options, run ovirt-aaa-jdbc-tool group-manage --help.

step.para: Add the newly created group in the Administration Portal and assign the group appropriate roles and permissions. The users in the group inherit the roles and permissions of the group. See for more information.

procedure.title: Creating Nested Groups
procedure.para: This procedure shows you how to create groups within groups.
